solution_line_template: If the elder son is {elder_son_current_age} years old now, the younger son is {elder_son_current_age}-{age_difference} = <<{elder_son_current_age}-{age_difference}={younger_son_current_age}>>{younger_son_current_age} years old.

In {years_from_now} years from now, the younger son will be {younger_son_current_age}+{years_from_now} = <<{younger_son_current_age}+{years_from_now}={younger_son_future_age}>>{younger_son_future_age} years old.
